Dear {{ doc.salutation }}. {{ doc.name1 or '' }},

Welcome to {{ doc.company }}.


We are pleased to offer you contractual employment in the position of {{doc.designation}} with {{doc.company}}, for a period of one year, effective from the date of joining and eager to have you as a part of our team.


The Company offers you a remuneration of Rs.{{ doc.ctc }}/-({{frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.ctc)}}) per year, as per the pay structure annexed herewith.

You will report to the General Manager of AM Foundation. You will work with high standard of initiative, creativeness, efficiency and economy in the organization.

You are required to work 6 days’ a week and to adhere to the working hours, as stipulated by our client.

You will be covered under the Group Personal Accident scheme of the Company.

Your employment with us will be governed by the Rules & Regulations of our Company.

You will not be entitled to any other allowances / benefits other than those specified in this letter and in the annexed pay structure.

Though you have been engaged for a specific position, the Company reserves the right to send you on deputation / transfer / assigning you to any of the Company’s branch offices / other clients’ offices in India or abroad, whether existing at the time of your appointment or to be set up in the future.

The contractual employment can be terminated by either of us by giving one month’s prior notice in writing.

Your signing this appointment letter confirms your acceptance of the terms and conditions and that you would be joining the Company.

Thanking you,

Yours sincerely,
For {{ doc.company|upper }}



K GOPALAKRISHNAN
DIRECTOR


Encl: Pay Structure
